Description: Located on the 8th floor of the Stratosphere, our resort style pool offers incredible views and bustling pool activity. Three over-sized spas, plenty of chaise lounges and piped-in music set the tone for a truly relaxing experience.Bar and Kitchen are closed during the Off-SeasonWhen your fun in the sun calls for a more private poolside retreat, you can rent your own cabana and enjoy the best Cabana Value on the Strip. Choose from several packages featuring just the right combination of amenities, including a variety of cold beverages and bottle service.OPEN | 11am-5pm DailyPoolside Caf‚ & Bar | Closed for the seasonAll Ages WelcomeNon-Hotel Guests $10Minors under 18 years of age must be accompanied by an adult.Stratosphere Hotel Guest must present room key upon entry.During off- season, pool access is granted only to hotel guests.Lifeguards on duty.
Location: 2000 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89104
